response:
There are two types of addons: Side Plugins and Addon Abilities.

You can download addon abilties from the forums and then put them in your `/plugins/ProjectKorra/Abilities` directory. These are generally singular abilities, but some addon packs are in this category, too.

Side plugins can be downloaded on the forums as well, but side plugins MUST go into the `/plugins/` folder instead.

If you are unsure where to put the addon, read the title of it on the forums. If it says [Side Plugin] in the name, it's a side plugin.

If you are still having trouble, you can ask for help in the <#300990411353358336> channel about the specific addon you are using.
